Title: (digital restoration) Beethoven Symphony No. 5 - Sir Georg Solti, Tokyo 1990
Description:
This is probably the closest we've ever get to hear and see the perfect Fifth that is very reminiscent of Carlos Kleiber's century's recording 15 years prior. 
Sir Georg Solti is known to have researched the metronome setting in Beethoven's days and this is what we get to see as the result.
CSO have had their many different leadership over the years but in my opinion Solti's era was their all-time-highest. During which also that the orchestra had played outside of North America in its 80-year history.

Work title: Beethoven - Symphony No. 5 in C minor, Op. 67
Conductor: Sir Georg Solti
Orchestra: Chicago Symphony Orchestra (CSO)
Venue: Suntory Hall, Tokyo, Japan
Record Date: 15 Apr 1990
Restoration Date: 12 June 2023

(00:00) I. Allegro con brio
(07:49) II. Andante con moto
(17:30) III. Scherzo: Allegro
(22:33) IV. Allegro

--

Title: Beethoven: Sinfonie Nr. 5  c-Moll op. 67 | Alan Gilbert | NDR Elbphilharmonie Orchester
Description:
Beim Benefizkonzert von Bundespräsident Frank-Walter Steinmeier spielt das NDR Elbphilharmonie Ludwig van Beethovens berühmte Sinfonie Nr. 5 e-Moll op. 67. Am Pult steht Chefdirigent Alan Gilbert. Ein Ausschnitt aus dem Konzert vom 27. Februar 2022 in der Elbphilharmonie Hamburg.

LUDWIG VAN BEETHOVEN
Sinfonie Nr. 5 c-Moll op. 67  00:00
I. Allegro con brio  00:01
II. Andante con moto  07:15
III. Allegro  16:27
IV. Allegro  24:18

Alan Gilbert, Dirigent
NDR Elbphilharmonie Orchester

Konzertmitschnitt vom Benefizkonzert des Bundespräsidenten am 27. Februar 2022, Elbphilharmonie Hamburg

Title: Symphony No. 5 - Beethoven  // Danish National Symphony Orchestra & Rafael Frühbeck de Burgos (Live)
Description:
#Beethoven250 #FrühbeckDeBurgos #DNSOarchive
[ 5:9 ] Danish National Symphony Orchestra celebrates Beethoven's 250 birthday in 2020 with special YouTube releases of all nine symphonies by Ludwig van Beethoven conducted by the orchestra's former  Chief Conductor Rafael Frühbeck de Burgos. 

Symphony No. 5
By Ludwig van Beethoven
Conducted by Rafael Frühbeck de Burgos
Danish National Symphony Orchestra/DR Symfoniorkestret

Title: Symphony No. 5 / Ludwig van Beethoven / Herbert Blomstedt / Oslo Philharmonic
Description:
The Oslo Philharmonic with Conductor Herbert Blomstedt performs Ludwig van Beethovens Symphony No. 5 in Oslo Concert Hall. The recording was made on 18 November, 2021. 

#beethoven #classicalmusic #symphony 

Video production: Trippel-M Levende Bilder 
Multicamera director: Magnus Kaslegard
Script: Steinar Yggeseth
Music producer: Vegard Landaas
Sound technician: Thomas Wold
Lighting design: Petter Dahl Nielsen
